blogs.title: How Steve Jobs's Personal Trauma Shaped the iPhone in Your Hand
blogs.subheading: Not all ideas come up from apple falling from tree, some can be result of years of personal issues.
blogs.content: Steve Jobs: The Man Who Connected His Dots. Every big personality has a story, and Steve Jobs was no different. He was like a complicated tapestry - full of bright threads and dark patches. His adoption trauma made him crave control, leading to Apple’s self-contained ecosystem. From calligraphy, he learned design elegance; from India, simplicity; from his father, integrity. His pursuit of purity shaped Apple’s philosophy and even his personal health journey. His life’s dots — pain, art, simplicity — connected to create the iPhone in your hand today.
